subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Red Sox hope Hideki Okajima, their new reliever, can nullify left-handed hitters like the Yankees’ Hideki Matsui, who was Okajima’s teammate in Japan.
snippet: The Red Sox hope Hideki Okajima, their new reliever, can nullify left-handed hitters like the Yankees’ Hideki Matsui, who was Okajima’s teammate in Japan.
